SEARCH
Package com.peaslimited.shoppeas.service

Interface ProductService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProductServiceImpl
public interface ProductService
This interface provides various methods for managing products being sold on ShopPeas such as retrieving product details, adding new products, updating existing products, and fetching product images.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addProduct(String PID, ProductDTO product)
    Adds a new product to the system using the given product details.
    Product
    findByProductName(String name)
    Retrieves a product based on its name.
    List<Product>
    getAllProducts()
    Retrieves a list of all products in the system.
    String
    getImageURLByProductName(String productName)
    Retrieves the image URL for a product based on its name.
    ProductDTO
    getProductById(String id)
    Retrieves product details for a given product ID (PID).
    void
    updateProduct(String PID, Map<String,Object> data)
    Updates an existing product's details using the given product ID and the data to be updated.

  • Method Details

    • getProductById

      ProductDTO getProductById(String id) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves product details for a given product ID (PID).
      Parameters:
      id - The product ID of the product whose details are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A ProductDTO object containing the product details.
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - If an error occurs during the execution of a task to retrieve product details.
      InterruptedException - If the thread executing the task is interrupted while waiting for the result.

    • getAllProducts

      List<Product> getAllProducts() throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves a list of all products in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of Product objects representing all the products in the system.
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - If an error occurs during the execution of a task to retrieve all products.
      InterruptedException - If the thread executing the task is interrupted while waiting for the result.

    • addProduct

      void addProduct(String PID, ProductDTO product)
      Adds a new product to the system using the given product details.
      Parameters:
      PID - The product ID for the new product to be added.
      product - A ProductDTO object containing the product details.

    • updateProduct

      void updateProduct(String PID, Map<String,Object> data) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Updates an existing product's details using the given product ID and the data to be updated.
      Parameters:
      PID - The product ID of the product to be updated.
      data - A map containing the product data to be updated (field names as keys and values to update).
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - If an error occurs during the execution of a task to update the product.
      InterruptedException - If the thread executing the task is interrupted while waiting for the result.

    • findByProductName

      Product findByProductName(String name) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves a product based on its name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the product to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A Product object representing the product with the given name.
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - If an error occurs during the execution of a task to retrieve the product.
      InterruptedException - If the thread executing the task is interrupted while waiting for the result.

    • getImageURLByProductName

      String getImageURLByProductName(String productName) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves the image URL for a product based on its name.
      Parameters:
      productName - The name of the product whose image URL is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The image URL of the product if available, otherwise null.
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - If an error occurs during the execution of a task to retrieve the image URL.
      InterruptedException - If the thread executing the task is interrupted while waiting for the result.
